api_list.name: Agent details
Search properties for sale
api_list.description: Search properties for sale by Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood. Filter the results using different parameter filters

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:

single_family
multi_family
land
townhomes
duplex_triplex
mobile
condos

condo_townhome
farm

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:

Newest_Listing 
Highest_Price 
Lowest_Price
Open_House_Date
Recently-Reduced
Largest_Sqft
Lot_Size
